summary.span: Implements base WPF support for the methods that store or retrieve name-object mappings into a particular XAML namescope.

span.span: Implements base WPF support for the methods that store or retrieve name-object mappings into a particular XAML namescope.

summary.span: Adds attached property support to make it simpler to get or set XAML namescope names dynamically at the element level..

span.span: Adds attached property support to make it simpler to get or set XAML namescope names dynamically at the element level..

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类实现的 XAML 的 WPF 处理的内置 XAML 命名空间支持。This class implements built-in XAML namescope support for WPF treatment of XAML. 创建基于分析 XAML，例如当实例化样式和模板的初始 XAML 名称范围中的协作。 assists in creation of initial XAML namescopes based on parsing XAML, such as when instantiating styles and templates. 它还支持的进程之外的元素的正常 XAML 加载出现的 WPF XAML 处理器实现的 XAML 名称范围的创建。It also supports creation of XAML namescopes by processes that occur outside of normal XAML loading of elements by the WPF XAML processor implementation. 是通常更专用于提供基础结构都涉及使用 XAML 名称范围的常见用户代码方案。 is generally more devoted to supplying infrastructure than for common user code scenarios that involve working with a XAML namescope. 大多数情况下，上公开的方法和更合适的方法来调用要搜索元素的 XAML 定义的名称。For most scenarios, the methods exposed on and are more appropriate methods to call to search for elements by XAML-defined name. 公开属性和是更合适的属性，用于将初始名称设置为标记特性。The properties exposed by and are more appropriate properties to use to set the initial name as markup attributes. 各种方法使用由基元素和维护的 XAML 名称范围，以便支持其他类和。The various methods of are used by base elements and other classes that maintain XAML namescopes in order to support and . 通常使用中的 API类仅当要替换或补充它们如何处理的 XAML 页，并为模板的一部分的根元素的 XAML 名称范围的基本元素行为 (其中使用单独 XAML 名称范围的其余部分页）。You generally use the API in the class only if you are replacing or augmenting the base element behavior for how they process XAML namescopes for root elements of a XAML page, and as part of templates (which use a separate XAML namescope from the rest of the page). 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]， ，你可以访问的 XAML 名称范围，包括通过对的调用添加到它所持有的名称的集合提供集合接口实现方法。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], provides collection interface implementations such that you can access the collections of names that are held by a XAML namescope, including adding to it through calls to an method. 有关 XAML 名称范围概念的详细信息，请参阅[WPF XAML Namescopes](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-xaml-namescopes.md)。For more information on XAML namescope concepts, see [WPF XAML Namescopes](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-xaml-namescopes.md). XAML 名称范围中的名称必须使用某个特定的语法，用于限制你可以将用于的输入字符串API。Names in a XAML namescope must use a particular grammar that restricts the strings you might use for inputs of API. 请参阅[XamlName 语法](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xamlname-grammar.md)。See [XamlName Grammar](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xamlname-grammar.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多个基元素 (， ) 还公开`FindName`方法具有相同的功能。Several base elements (, ) also expose a `FindName` method with identical functionality. 基元素版本执行传统的逻辑树，致力于根元素中的 XAML 名称范围搜索。The base element versions perform a XAML namescope search within the conventional logical tree, working towards the root element. 一旦确定 XAML 名称范围后，该 XAML 名称范围查询来搜索请求的名称。Once the XAML namescope is determined, that XAML namescope is queried for the requested name.
